execution_plan.description: Find all goods IDs (product ids) with price greater than 13 dollars from the goods database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id FROM goods WHERE price > 13;

execution_plan.description: Get distinct receipt numbers from the items database where the purchased item's id is one of the goods returned in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT Receipt FROM items WHERE Item IN ($step1.id);
